name: DOSCraft
description:
This is a very basic 2D Minecraft clone where you can move, pick up and place blocks.

It was written in QBasic for MS-DOS/DOSBox

Size of the game with the required BRUN45.EXE bundled and zipped came to 30,892 bytes but the game alone came to only 8,192 bytes!

Controls:

  • Hit Q to exit
  • W,A,S,D to move
  • P to pick up blocks
  • O to place blocks
  • 1,2,3,4,5,6 to select blocks to place
  • E to open craft menu
  • 1,2 to select an item to craft (item will be crafted when you leave crafting menu)
  • To be able to craft an item you have to have the required materials
    • You need 1 tree to craft a crafting bench
    • You need 3 trees and stand on top of a crafting bench to craft a wooden pick axe
  • Crafting bench is only used for the wooden pick axe
  • The wooden pick axe is used to mine stone

Have Fun!
